claim: Flublok contains 45 micrograms (mcg) of HA per strain vs 15 mcg of HA per strain in a standard-dose influenza vaccine.
explanation: A forest plot titled “Relative Vaccine Effectiveness (95% CI)” showing point estimates and confidence intervals for various subgroups (e.g., PCR-confirmed influenza, hospitalization for PCR-confirmed influenza, hospitalization for community-acquired pneumonia) and preexisting conditions (cardiovascular disease, respiratory disease, cardiorespiratory disease, obesity, diabetes, any of the above) among participants aged 50–64. The figure presents relative effectiveness data across clinical subgroups but does not include any information on hemagglutinin antigen content per strain; therefore, it does not support the claim about HA microgram amounts.
